desc: 1 Ace of Hearts will be obtained per 50 Slot Machine draws ({1}/20)
1 Ace of Hearts will be obtained per Super Slot Machine draw ({1}/10)
1 Ace of Hearts will be obtained per 500 Gems consumed ({1}/5)
1 Ace of Hearts will be obtained per 10 Junior Varsity battles completed ({1}/5)
10 Ace of Hearts will be obtained per 6-star Girl obtained ({1}/1)
